articles.title: Xiaomi Sold Over 1 Crore Mi Power Banks Assembled in India, Company Announces - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Xiaomi has sold over 1 crore Mi Power Banks, the company tweeted on November 3. The Chinese smartphone maker began assembling power banks in India in 2017. Three years later, the company announced that it has overcome the 1 crore-unit mark in terms of sales.
